item.title: A passwordless serial console for your Raspberry Pi
item.description: legendre on #raspbian asked: How can i config rasp lite to open a shell on the serial uart on boot? Params are 1200-8-N-1 Dont want login running, just straight to sh The process is fairly simple. First, you need to ensure you have a functional serial port. If you're on a Raspberry Pi 3 (or later), you may need to explicitly enable the serial port by adding enable_uart=1 to /boot/config.
